turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm going to need to place a pick up order for Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, which Starbucks will it be at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to the one on West Market Street, Johnson City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, and what would you like in the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: First, I'd like a grande coffee of the day...

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Black or cream or sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just black. And then I need an iced cappuccino for Lindsey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size on that one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall will be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any cream in that or added flavor syrup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cream is fine. No need for anything else.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please add two pieces of banana bread to that order if they have them today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I got it. would you like those heated up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, they don't need to heat them. I'll do that myself at the office.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I've got it. Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I have a grande black coffee, a tall cappuccino with cream, and two pieces of banana bread. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is all correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will get this ordered and the pick up time should be in approximately 20 minutes from now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
